summary: Iteration 52 - Tab Merging & Photo Column Feature Verification. All requested features verified successfully: Student form tabs merged from 9 to 6, Employee form tabs merged from 8 to 5, Photo column added to students table, School name/logo displayed in sidebar, and favicon/app icon updates with school logo.

issues: Console warning: Chart width/height -1 - minor recharts sizing issue on initial load

success_rate.backend: N/A (skipped per request - frontend only testing)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Tab merging feature implemented. Student form: 6 tabs (Basic, ID & Docs, Family & Contact, Bank, Transport & Medical, Documents). Employee form: 5 tabs (Basic, Personal & Contact, ID & Documents, Bank & Salary, Login Access). Photo column added to students table with placeholder icons.

photo_column_in_students_table.details: Photo column visible in students table header with placeholder user icons for each student row

student_form_merged_tabs.details: Student form has 6 tabs: Basic, ID & Docs, Family & Contact, Bank, Transport & Medical, Documents (merged from 9 tabs)

employee_form_merged_tabs.details: Employee form has 5 tabs: Basic, Personal & Contact, ID & Documents, Bank & Salary, Login Access (merged from 8 tabs)

sidebar_school_name.details: School name 'Test School for ID Card' displayed in sidebar with school logo

dashboard_loads.details: Dashboard loads correctly with school branding, stat cards, and quick actions

new_admission_form_opens.details: New Admission form opens with merged tabs and all fields accessible

add_employee_form_opens.details: Add Employee form opens with merged tabs and all fields accessible
